subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Arkansas put Jessica Dorrell, the former mistress of Bobby Petrino, on paid leave and disclosed that she used a $20,000 “gift” from him to buy a car in her first week on the job.
snippet: Arkansas put Jessica Dorrell, the former mistress of Bobby Petrino, on paid leave and disclosed that she used a $20,000 “gift” from him to buy a car in her first week on the job.
